CControlChart¶

class CControlChart.CControlChart(c: list, n: list, xlabel: str = '', ylabel: str = '')¶

Bases: ControlChart

Initialization.

Parameters:

  • c – number of defects in the samples.

  • n – sample sizes.

  • xlabel – x-as label.

  • ylabel – y-as label.

data(index: int)¶

Returns the data.

Parameters:

index – The index for the data (0 = C chart)

plot()¶

Create the plot.

split(stages: list)¶

Split the chart.

Parameters:

stages – The stages.

stable()¶

Returns the stable indicator.
